page.title: 16POPULATION
page.content: DISTRIBUTION There are two big centres of population in our block. These are the centres of Newton village (44 30 upper half) and 44 31 south of the A583, and Clifton village (46 31). These are a mixture of and new houses at a ratio of about 10 new houses to 1 old one.The rest of the population are scattered throughout the block, some are farmers and the rest are employed outside the village. TYPES & AGES Most families are British;there are a few old local families but most people have come to this area because of their work.Many people in the block are fairly young, between 27 or 28 and 45 and live in their own houses MOVEMENT Quite a lot of people move in and out of the area because of their jobs.
